data.message: Hi, my Facebook account and username has been used with another person in the same window. When I surf it is blinking and stop suddenly. I can not use or install messenger on my device because of the blockage created by the devil.. I tried many times to get back into my original account but no way. It appears 2016 when I changed my name with the same gmail account which I created 2010. I still can see some of my downloaded sometimes and then disappear just like that. Please help me to find the solution to get back into my original account.And open the messenger so I can use it inmy device.

replies.message: Hey Rede. You can learn how to recover an old account you can't log into here: http://bit.ly/2zK6GcR. If you continue to have problems, please report it to us. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2y0Bioh.  -Tenaya
